WorkItem.ClosedComment: User isn't providing any information that would let us actually help him.
WorkItem.Description: As part of another error I can't open all the tabs to tick off that I have said items, or they are just not present. When I attempt to optimize when everything I have equipped isn't avaliable silverlight crashes.
WorkItem.Summary: Silverlight Crash equiped items are not avaliable.

Comments.Message: I'm sorry that you're having a problem. Unfortunately, we can't do anything to help you, based on what you've typed here. We'd love to help, you just haven't told us what your problem is.

I'll try to explain better. For whatever reason I am unable tick every item equipped as available and when I attempt to go ahead and optimize anyways and it warns me that not everything I have equipeped, like normal, it crashes. If its any help i'm using TankDK.
Can you at least screenshot the error you are getting trying to mark the items for the optimizer?
Yeah, I'll get that ss for you after my raid but it wasn't just that. Gems weren't showing up at all. I tried cache reset a few times to no avail.

Yeah, you're really giving us nothing to go on to help you. If you want help, you'll have to actually tell us the errors you're encountering. Imagine you're us; tell yourself everything you need to know in order to help solve the problem.
With the silverlight crashing there was no error. It just crashed.
